page.title: 13ENJOYING A DAY OUT.
page.content: A popular activity at the week-end is to go on a visit to a local attraction Some people enjoy visiting{museums such as the Nelson Museum in Monmouth, Chepstow Museum, or Wolvesnewton Folk Museum. The new Roman Museum in Caerleon should be interesting too. There are lots of{castles}in this part of Wales: Raglan, Caldicot and Chepstow are interesting ruins whilst Penhow Castle is a super renovation. { Wildlife parks}are popular for day trips because you can get close to the animals in their natural surroundings. The lions at Longleat and the wildfowl at Slimbridge provide interesting visits. Usually families go in their cars and take a picnic meal to eat on their day trip, but sometimes large groups of people will go together on a coach.
